|pwr_optional = true |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== SMC P/N: 751.8263, Sub. Assy. P/N: 721.8263
"UH697 VER:1.0" is silkscreened on the board. :This text matches up with the [[Dynex DX-UH227]], which is pretty much identical in form factor, identical in back port labeling, and identical in LED configuration. The manufacturer of the device (which seems to be [http://www.goodway.com.tw/ia/product3.asp?listid=3&id=4&subid=7&pid=302&typeid=8# '''Good Way'''] [[http://web.archive.org/web/20031123190108/http://www.goodway.com.tw/en/prodimg/manual/UH697.pdf pdf]]) is certainly the same.
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.smc.com/files/AV/QIG_SMCUSBH7_EN.pdf Manual] (copyright 2003)
